comments.author: Mathieu
comments.content:
In my opinion money per se, as a mean of making exchanges, is probably one of mankind's best inventions and has greatly contributed to technological progress. But the system should be more regulated and resources should be more equally distributed.

I have more grudge against the shareholder system. Recently on French TV, there has been debates on cooperatives (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Workers%27_co-operative). I think that this model can work for technological companies too.

comments.author: Xi
comments.content: They don't say that there's no such thing as a free lunch for nothing!
